fields.html:
{% load verbatim %}
<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html ng-app="RedwoodHighFrequencyTrading">
<head>
  <title>Start</title>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/jquery/jquery.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/flot/jquery.flot.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/flot/jquery.flot.dashes.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/d3/d3.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/jquery/jquery-ui-1.10.3.custom.js"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/bootstrap/bootstrap-3.1.1.min.js"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/angular/angular-1.2.16.js"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/redwoodCore.js"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/redwoodHelpers.js"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/redwoodSubject.js"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/synchronizedStopWatch.js"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}ExperimentComponents/js/subjectHeader.js"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}ExperimentComponents/js/configManager.js"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/redwood-high-frequency-trading/RedwoodHighFrequencyTradingModule.js"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/redwood-high-frequency-trading/utility.js"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/redwood-high-frequency-trading/DataHistory.js"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/redwood-high-frequency-trading/MarketAlgorithm.js"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/redwood-high-frequency-trading/Graph.js"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/redwood-high-frequency-trading/GroupManager.js"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/redwood-high-frequency-trading/start.js"></script>
  <link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/css/bootstrap-3.1.1.min.css"></link>
	<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/css/ui-lightness/jquery-ui-1.10.3.custom.css"></link>
	<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/redwood-high-frequency-trading/Graph.css"></link>
	<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/redwood-high-frequency-trading/debug.css"></link>
	<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/redwood-high-frequency-trading/start.css"></link>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		{{ js }}
	</script>
	<style type="text/css">
		{{ css }}
	</style>
</head>

<body ng-include="'/static/experiments/redwood-high-frequency-trading/start.html'"></body>

</html>
fields.name: Start

fields.name: Finish
